I love generator-hottowel!

I updated versions of npm packages in \app\templates_package.json to avoid error in gulp-less running gulp vet. Google search confirmed that gulp-less needs to be updated. I took the opportunity to update them all. Also updated package.json in the root. It’s fine now and running the app.

Thx, Ivan
